message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm more affected by inflation.
Alice, your sense of fairness is a little skewed. Let's be more realistic. This offer ensures we both benefit.
Bob, time is literally money! Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains. This offer is still better than what you'll get if you decline.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Any more delays and we both lose out.
